welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rathdrum, a charming city nestled in the heart of the United States. Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that Rathdrum has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coeur D'Alene Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Coeur D'Alene Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Felts Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Felts Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
